exploreUrl:
<js>
sort = [];
push = (title, url) => sort.push({ title, url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25 } });

[
  ["穿越小说", "xclass/chuanyue/{{page}}/"],
  ["言情小说", "xclass/yanqing/{{page}}/"],
  ["现代都市", "xclass/dushi/{{page}}/"],
  ["耽美百合", "xclass/baihe/{{page}}/"],
  ["历史架空", "xclass/lishi/{{page}}/"],
  ["美文同人", "xclass/tongren/{{page}}/"],
  ["武侠仙侠", "xclass/wuxia/{{page}}/"],
  ["玄幻小说", "xclass/xuanhuan/{{page}}/"],
  ["惊悚悬疑", "xclass/jingsong/{{page}}/"],
  ["科幻小说", "xclass/kehuan/{{page}}/"],
  ["网游竞技", "xclass/wangyou/{{page}}/"],
  ["管理哲学", "xclass/zhexue/{{page}}/"],
  ["学习资料", "xclass/ziliao/{{page}}/"],
  ["完本小说", "quanben/xclass/{{page}}/"]
].map(([title, url]) => push(title, url));

JSON.stringify(sort);

</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.intro: ☁️ 更新：{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}} 👻 简介：{{@@.bookintro@textNodes##.*专业无弹窗.*|.*无弹窗阅读.*}}##(^|[。！？……]+[”」）】]?)##$1
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

searchUrl:
<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.key)
url=source.key;
a=java.webView(null,url,null);
//java.log(a)
b=a.match(/action=\"([^"]*)\"/)[1];
c=`,{"method": "post","body":"searchkey=${key}"}`;
b+=c
</js>
